title: Everest Ultimate Edition 4.50-serial incl
description:
CPU and FPU benchmarks to support 3-core and 6-core processors.

Disk Benchmark can now do disk write tests under Windows Vista.


System Stability

Revamped System Stability Test module that will be able to stress and provide insight about your system?s CPU and memory like never before.


Motherboards

Support for the Intel Skulltrail platform

Support for Intel 5400, Cantiga and G35 chipsets

Support for AMD 740G/780G chipsets

Support for nVIDIA nForce 750i/780i/790i chipsets.

Support for SiS 672 chipset


Graphics

Support for ATI Radeon HD 34xx/36xx and Radeon HD 3870 X2 family of graphics processors.

Support for nVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS, GeForce 8800 GTS 512, GeForce 9300M G, GeForce 9500M GS and GeForce 9800 GX2 family of graphics processors.


Other

Support for Enhanced Performance Profiles 2.0.

Support for Microsoft Windows PE v2.

Support for PCI Express 2.0 controllers and devices.

Temperature readout for FB-DIMM memory modules.

ATA auto-detect and SMART information for USB and FireWire hard disk drives behind Cypress, JMicron and Oxford bridge chips.


Major Bug Fixes

Crash during ACPI tables enumeration

SQL database communication and timeout issues (applies to CE only!)

Disk Benchmark: disk write tests under Windows Vista

Lockup on DFI LANParty and Infinity motherboards, and MSI MegaBook notebooks

Removing Auto Start Registry entries under 64-bit Windows

Support for PCI Express 2.0 controllers and devices

SPD information for DDR3 memory modules with bad SPD CRC


Click here for a more detailed list and screen shots of the new features.


Pricing and Availability

EVEREST Ultimate Edition and EVEREST Corporate Edition 4.50 are available immediately for download at www.lavalys.com. EVEREST licenses can be purchased directly from Lavalys Online Store or from your local Lavalys reseller. For more information about our products, upgrade policies and pricing, please contact us at sales at lavalys.com.

About Lavalys

Lavalys is dedicated to providing effective and economical solutions to small, medium and large-scale companies. Our products help network administrators and systems integrators with their job of providing well-integrated and cost-effective network management and security solutions. Lavalys is committed to meeting those needs through its worldwide partnerships with value added resellers and business partners. Our tools and solutions for Windows are setting the standard in this market segment.

We are continuously seeking new solutions and ways our customers can improve and accelerate the systems they work with every day, so that they can concentrate on what is truly important: their core competence.
